sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'
import {CCard, CCardBody, CCol, CNav, CNavItem, CNavLink, CRow, CTabContent, CTabPane, CTabs,} from '@coreui/react'
import ProductForm from "./ProductForm";
import ProductTable from "./ProductTable";
import * as axios from "axios";

const Product = () => {

  let productList=[]

  function fetchAllNews() {

    let productSearch={
      "productCategory": "",
      "productCode": "",
      "productName": "",
      "productType": ""
    }

    let page=1
    let size=10

    axios.put('http://localhost:8080/api/v1/product/search?page=' + page + "&size=" + size,{productSearch})
      // .then(response => response.json())
      .then(response => {
        const data=response.data.responseDTOList
        console.log("productList=" + data)

          productList= data

        console.log(productList)
      })
  }



  const [active, setActive] = useState(1)
  const lorem = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit.'

  return (
    <CRow>
      <CCol xs="12" md="12" className="mb-4">
        <CCard>
          {/*<CCardHeader>*/}
          {/*  Index indentifiers*/}
          {/*</CCardHeader>*/}
          <CCardBody>
            <CTabs>
              <CNav variant="tabs">
                <CNavItem>
                  <CNavLink>
                    Add Product
                  </CNavLink>
                </CNavItem>
                <CNavItem>
                  <CNavLink>
                    Manage
                  </CNavLink>
                </CNavItem>
              </CNav>

              <CTabContent>

                <CTabPane>
                  <ProductForm/>
                </CTabPane>

                <CTabPane>
                  <ProductTable fetchAllNews={fetchAllNews}
                  productList={productList}/>
                </CTabPane>

              </CTabContent>
            </CTabs>
          </CCardBody>
        </CCard>
      </CCol>
    </CRow>
  )
}

export default Product
